casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ruben WRIGHT, Jr. No. 614P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2008. James R. Parish, Fayetteville, for Wright. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of January 2008 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Response:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 1st day of February 2008 to file and serve his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of January 2008."
